text:
@realDonaldTrump Anybody that is stupid enough to believe trump and become exposed and infected and possibly worse is an idiot. 
America, heed the medical professionals and scientists. Not a greedy often bankrupt narcissist. He's protected from getting COVID-19 and only in it for the money.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
